list.name: app
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT process_name AS __text, process_name AS __value FROM events ORDER BY 1

list.name: country
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT remote_country AS __text, remote_country AS __value FROM events WHERE remote_country <> '' ORDER BY 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT date_trunc('minute', ts) AS time, count(*) AS value FROM events WHERE threat_score >= ${min_score} AND $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT date_trunc('minute', ts) AS time, count(*) AS value FROM events WHERE $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

SELECT remote_ip, remote_country, max(threat_score) AS max_score, count(*) AS hits FROM events WHERE threat_score >= ${min_score} AND $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY max_score DESC, hits DESC LIMIT 20
SELECT process_name AS app, count(*) AS connections, count(DISTINCT remote_ip) AS unique_ips FROM events WHERE process_name ILIKE ${app} AND $__timeFilter(ts) GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT ts, process_name, remote_ip, remote_country, threat_sources, threat_score FROM events WHERE threat_score >= ${min_score} AND process_name ILIKE ${app} AND remote_country ILIKE ${country} AND $__timeFilter(ts) ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 200
